description:
Delayed array saved in a group of a HDF5 file as an n-dimensional dataset. This follows the [**chihaya**](https://ltla.github.io/chihaya) specification for delayed operations, based on the [**DelayedArray**](https://bioconductor.org/packages/DelayedArray) Bioconductor package.

For integer and boolean datasets, missing values are represented by -2147483648.

A string dataset may contain a `missing-value-placeholder` attribute. This should be a scalar string dataset that contains the string used to represent missing values. If no attribute exists, it is assumed that all strings are non-missing. Note that any string dataset in a `dimnames` operation should only contain non-missing strings.

Derived from `array/v1.json`: some kind of multi-dimensional array, where we store metadata about the dimensions and type of data. The exact implementation of the array is left to concrete subclasses.

type.description: Type of data stored in this array.

group.description: Name of the group containing the delayed array.

is_child.description: Is this a child document, only to be interpreted in the context of the parent document from which it is linked? This may have implications for search and metadata requirements.

path.description: Path to the file in the project directory.

title: HDF5 delayed array
